extendedInfo.description: EcordiApp is the mobile application for the Ecordia e-portfolio and e-assessment solution for training centres and education establishments. EcordiApp is designed to assist users in gathering evidence quickly and efficiently using their Android device. You will need to have a current username and password to use EcordiApp, because this application is designed to be used in conjunction with the main Ecordia system.Key Features:- Progress and gap analysis- Digital signatures & verification- Create and upload videos, images and audio files- Access assessment plans and download learning materials- Type evidence records â such as observations and reflective accounts.- Add and submit new evidence in a portfolio- View, prepare and submit existing evidence â and download evidence attachments- Link and cross-reference evidence to the course standards- View and accept assessment feedback and unit completion declarations- Offline and Sync: enabling you to use EcordiApp without internet access, then when you are able to connect to the internet the app will synchronise with Ecordia
